body_html:
I think this fluctuation is just fine, because errors that I save and print are only those from the first batch. As the first batch is random with shuffle=True, the error fluctuates compared to the second case where the model is trained on always the same batches in same order.

What I was thinking when I opened the issue was a possible mix of input and target order during shuffling, but that's not the case.
